localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: SST (Serverless Stack) is a framework that makes it easy to build serverless apps. It features: -- - A Live Lambda Development environment - Zero-config support for ES and TypeScript - Higher-level constructs designed for serverless
nodes.title: SST - Work on your serverless apps live
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Runops is a command-line app that lets you query databases and manage servers using a single tool. It adds Git versioning, reviews in Slack, and sensitive data masking to every command you run from the terminal.
nodes.title: Runops - Run one-off scripts as production-ready automations
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Our serverless Kubernetes platform is designed for the needs of fast moving development teams who want to focus on delivering applications, not operations.
nodes.title: CTO.ai 2.0 - A smarter workflow for Cloud Native apps
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: Hi ProductHunterğŸ‰ Try our AI based estimation tool Engineerforce for software development. You simply input a task you will develop and our AI model will calculate the number of man-hours needed to develop.
nodes.title: Engineerforce - Realize the objective estimation for developer based on AI
nodes.author: Iida Yoshiaki

nodes.excerpt: Incident Timer is a â€œdays without incidentâ€ timer for developers. The beautifully designed dashboard helps you to keep track of major software incidents. Itâ€™s free and takes just 2 minutes to set up.

nodes.excerpt: Taloflow is the fastest way to find the best dev and cloud tools for your use case. We provide expert buying advice and tailored analysis to match your requirements with the best solution every time.
nodes.title: Taloflow - Find the best dev and cloud tools for your use case
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Explo lets you build customer-facing dashboards that fit seamlessly into your existing application. Connect directly to your database or warehouse, build custom-styled dashboards, and embed in your application within a day.
nodes.title: Explo 2.0 - Customer-facing dashboards and reports - lightning fast

nodes.excerpt: Booste APIs boiling all the pains of the production ML stack into a single line of code. We're super excited to launch an API to OpenAI's powerful new no-training-needed image classifier to Python and Node. Give it a spin!
nodes.title: CLIP API by Booste - Use OpenAI's newest image classifier with one line of code.
nodes.author: Erik Dunteman

nodes.excerpt: Learn vim without enduring boring text only tutorials. vim.so gets you the muscle repetition needed to master vim quickly using interactive exercises. Vim adds code editing super powers to your editor of choice. Learn vim fast today!

nodes.excerpt: This extension attempts to recover your suspended Great Suspender tabs by searching your browser history and displaying any found suspended tabs. You can then: - adjust grouping, sorting and detail - save as folders and bookmarks - copy URLs to the clipboard
nodes.title: The Great Suspender Recovery Tool - Recover your lost Great Suspender tabs

nodes.excerpt: Console is a free weekly email digest of the best tools and beta releases for developers. We keep track of everything - dev tools, devops, cloud, and APIs - so you don't have to.

nodes.excerpt: React UI Boutique is a set of beautiful UI components built with Chakra UI and Framer Motion. You can use them to jump-start your projects or get inspiration. Create good looking pages without hiring a designer or losing countless hours doing it yourself.

nodes.excerpt: Rollcall makes it easy to organize remote meetings with people in any timezone. Add to Slack, create an agenda, schedule a timeframe and the Rollcall bot collects your standup in text, audio-only, screen share and video formats.
nodes.title: Rollcall - Asynchronous standup meetings in Slack.
nodes.author: Mike McMillan

nodes.excerpt: GetMyInvoices is the central invoice management software for your company. The solution automatically retrieves invoices & other documents from thousands of sources â€“ from portals over email postboxes and cloud storages to scanned documents. 14 Days FREE Trial
nodes.title: GetMyInvoices.com - Automatically retrieve invoices & docs from thousand sources
nodes.author: GetMyInvoices

nodes.excerpt: Project Lightspeed is a self contained live streaming server. With Lightspeed you will be able to deploy your own sub-second latency streaming site. The Lightspeed repository contains the instructions for installing and deploying the entire application.
